inclusion.criterion: Informed consent and HIPAA authorization for release of personal health information obtained.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age ≥ 18 years at the time of consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0-2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Histological confirmation of biopsy-proven peripheral T-cell leukemia/lymphoma consistent with ATLL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Included subtypes will be: acute, lymphomatous, and chronic unfavorable. Chronic unfavorable is defined as the chronic variant with at least one of the following:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Positive human T-lymphotropic virus-1 (HTLV-1) antibody testing with confirmatory testing via Western blot, enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA), or molecular testing (PCR).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented negative serologic testing for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If positive for HBV exposure or prior infection, can continue to participate in trial with prophylactic entecavir (for HBV). If positive for hepatitis c virus (HCV) exposure or active infection, can participate in trial with monitoring for liver function abnormalities.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Demonstrate adequate organ function as defined below; all screening labs to be obtained within three days prior to study treatment.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: System: Renal - Calculated creatinine clearance Laboratory Value: ≥ 30 mL/min using the Cockcroft-Gault formula for subjects with creatinine levels > 2.0 x institutional ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: System: Hepatic - Bilirubin Laboratory Value: ≤ 3.0 mg/dL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: System: Hepatic - Aspartate aminotransferase (AST) Laboratory Value: ≤ 2.5 × ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: System: Hepatic - Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) Laboratory Value: ≤ 2.5 × ULN
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has a known additional malignancy that is active and/or progressive requiring treatment; exceptions include basal cell or squamous cell skin cancer, in situ cervical or bladder cancer, or other cancer for which the subject has been disease-free for at least five years.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation, with recent worsening palpable lymphadenopathy. He has received multiple lines of therapy without significant response.
